title: "beater collector" WTB: T206 HOFer w/ SC350-460/25 back, T206 HOFer Cycle 350, T213-1
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: "beater collector" WTB: T206 HOFer w/ SC350-460/25 back, T206 HOFer Cycle 350, T213-1
posts.post_content:
This here "Beater Collector" is looking for a T206 HOFer we don't already own.  

T206 Back Needed: Sweet Caporal 350-460 Subjects, Factory 25.

GRADED between: SGC 20-50 or PSA 1.5 - 4.

Can pay via PAYPAL or by check.

Please email us in strict confidence with what you have and your asking price, and if it's a HOFer we need, we'll ask for scans.

Email: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

America's Easiest Want List.

Thank yous in advance.


Edited to add a few other things I'm looking for:

2) T206 HOFer with a Cycle 350 back (want a HOFer I don't already have) in SGC 20-50 condition or PSA equivalent.

3) 1910 T213 Coupon Type 1 common or HOFer in SGC 10-40 or PSA equivalent.

4) T206 Shag Shaughnessy with any back (Old Mill, Piedmont, or Hindu)

5) T216 Peoples Tobacco (Kotton, MINO, VE).

posts.post_title: Nice to see the Eric's on the board
Added more to my current want list.
posts.post_content:
1) T206 HOFer (that I don't have) with a SC 350-460 factory 25 back SGC 20-50 or PSA equivalent.

2) T206 HOFer with a Cycle 350 back (want a HOFer I don't already have) in SGC 20-50 condition or PSA equivalent.

3) 1910 T213 Coupon Type 1 common or HOFer in SGC 10-40 or PSA equivalent.

4) T206 Shag Shaughnessy with any back (Old Mill, Piedmont, or Hindu), in any grade.

5) T216 Peoples Tobacco (Kotton, MINO, VE) in any grade.
